name: Mathlete7
description:
Entry for LM0B Beginners Game Jam #7: Theme ' The Number 7'

A simple math puzzle game, you will be shown a math formula and you have 7 doors that represent the correct answer between 1 & 7.  Use A & D to move from right to left to line up with the correct answer. 

Assets Used

Background:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/p/farland-skies-cloudy-crown-60004 by Borodar

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/jazz-comedy by Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound)

Fonts: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Abril+Fatface  by TypeTogether
